title: PV Sindhu loses to Li Xuerui in Denmark Open final
text: PV Sindhu loses to Li Xuerui in Denmark Open final Sunday, 18 October 2015 (1 minute ago) PV Sindhu, playing her maiden Super Series final, went down 21-19 21-12 to Li Xuerui in the summit clash. A rampaging PV Sindhu outclassed back-to-back world champion Carolina Marin 21-15, 18-21, 21-17 to waltz into the final of the Denmark Open Superseries Premier tournament.
